title: Are You Dooming Yourself To Failure
dc:creator: Tracy Brinkmann | Personal Development in the spirit of Tony Robbins, Napoleon Hill, & Zig Ziglar
description:
Â 

Much of our happiness and success is the result of our thinking. So, too, are our failures. And our thoughts are revealed in how we speak to ourselves as well as others. What you say to yourself during the course of the day largely determines the outcome. Like an evil mist, negative thinking has an insidious way of weaving its wispy tendrils into our thoughts and words. Over time, it becomes a habit â€“ so much so that you might not even notice it. But you canâ€™t help but notice the result: failure, time and time again. The solution is to develop new habits in your thinking so lets chat a bit about what signs to watch for and how to overcome them. - CLICK & LISTEN then LIKE & SHARE!
